explanations.masculine-coded: Your posting contains more stereotypically masculine-coded than feminine-coded words. Studies show this appeals more to men and may discourage women from applying.
explanations.feminine-coded: Your posting contains more stereotypically feminine-coded than masculine-coded words. This may encourage women to apply. Stereotypically feminine-coded wording barely affects men's application interest.
explanations.empty: Your posting contains no gender-coded words. The language is gender-fair.
explanations.neutral: Your posting contains stereotypically masculine and feminine-coded words equally. The language is gender-fair.

error.detail: Failed to analyze the text. Please try refreshing the page, or contact us if the problem continues.
